data.text:
There it is! 2nd prize! 『One day Resort and Spa tickets]! 
Congratulations~!
data.name: Lottery Attendant
data.processed:
<story>There it is! 2nd prize! 『One day Resort and Spa tickets]! 
<story>Congratulations~!

data.text:
――And so, I went as soon as I could. Since it was 
built by the beach, the resort had a very open feel 
to it. I could just feel the fatigue melting away.
data.processed:
<story>――And so, I went as soon as I could. Since it was 
<story>built by the beach, the resort had a very open feel 
<story>to it. I could just feel the fatigue melting away.

data.text: Oh.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>Oh.

data.text: So even someone like you would come to places like this, huh.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu

choices.text: I won tickets……you come here often?
I won tickets……you come here often?

data.processed: <story>So even someone like you would come to places like this, huh.

data.text: When I feel like it.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>When I feel like it.

data.text:
……Now I was a little curious how she spent her days off. 
If I understood more about her, things might go more smoothly.

choices.text: Do you mind if I tag along?

data.processed:
<story>……Now I was a little curious how she spent her days off. 
<story>If I understood more about her, things might go more smoothly.

data.text: You can do as you like.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>You can do as you like.

data.text:
And so, I ended up accompanying Mejiro Ramonu. 
The first thing she did was head to the shopping 
area, visiting a cosmetics shop first.
data.processed:
<story>And so, I ended up accompanying Mejiro Ramonu. 
<story>The first thing she did was head to the shopping 
<story>area, visiting a cosmetics shop first.

data.text:
――Mejiro Ramonu-sama. As always, thanks for your patronage. 
New seasonal products have just arrived, so please have a look.
data.name: Shopclerk
data.processed:
<story>――Mejiro Ramonu-sama. As always, thanks for your patronage. 
<story>New seasonal products have just arrived, so please have a look.

data.text: Oh, we're able to get these in Japan now too.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>Oh, we're able to get these in Japan now too.

data.text:
Ah, so you were already aware. These are the newest versions 
with new ingredients. How about a quick touch up……
data.name: Shopclerk
data.processed:
<story>Ah, so you were already aware. These are the newest versions 
<story>with new ingredients. How about a quick touch up……

data.text: From here to here……could you wrap these up?
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>From here to here……could you wrap these up?

data.text: Thank you very much.
data.name: Shopclerk
data.processed: <story>Thank you very much.

data.text:
Next was the spa. She headed to the VIP room alone, hitting 
the bath, sauna, and some aromatherapy too……or so I was told.
data.processed:
<story>Next was the spa. She headed to the VIP room alone, hitting 
<story>the bath, sauna, and some aromatherapy too……or so I was told.

data.text:
……guess you aren't one for baths. 
Have you been there the whole time?
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>……guess you aren't one for baths. 
<story>Have you been there the whole time?

data.text:
In fact, after taking a short bath I was relaxing 
and also enjoying a drink while waiting for her.
data.processed:
<story>In fact, after taking a short bath I was relaxing 
<story>and also enjoying a drink while waiting for her.

data.text: I see…… Ahh, it's already time for my footcare appointment――
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>I see…… Ahh, it's already time for my footcare appointment――

data.text:
Afterwards, we had a slightly early dinner. At first glance, 
it looked like a casual meal, typical of a resort but……
data.processed:
<story>Afterwards, we had a slightly early dinner. At first glance, 
<story>it looked like a casual meal, typical of a resort but……

data.text: Right. And rich in seasonal flavors……
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>Right. And rich in seasonal flavors……

data.text:
We must be careful what enters our blood and becomes part of us. 
On the turf, we only have one body to rely on after all……
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>We must be careful what enters our blood and becomes part of us. 
<story>On the turf, we only have one body to rely on after all……

data.text:
Compromising on something like this, 
wouldn't be something I would call love.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>Compromising on something like this, 
<story>wouldn't be something I would call love.

data.text:
All of today's self-care and even the meal in front 
of us, all of it was for the sake of "Races"……
data.processed:
<story>All of today's self-care and even the meal in front 
<story>of us, all of it was for the sake of "Races"……

data.text:
When we finished our meal and went outside, the area 
was already enveloped in the colors of a sunset.
data.processed:
<story>When we finished our meal and went outside, the area 
<story>was already enveloped in the colors of a sunset.

data.text: Oh, what a nice evening.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>Oh, what a nice evening.

data.text: …………Maybe I should draw.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>…………Maybe I should draw.

data.text:
Collecting fragments of this moment. By breaking 
them down, combining, and then layering them…… 
beyond all that, is where my painting exists.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>Collecting fragments of this moment. By breaking 
<story>them down, combining, and then layering them…… 
<story>beyond all that, is where my painting exists.

data.text: Aah, quickly…… before it disappears……
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>Aah, quickly…… before it disappears……

data.text:
Mejiro Ramonu went to fetch her materials, 
then set up her easel and started sketching.
data.processed:
<story>Mejiro Ramonu went to fetch her materials, 
<story>then set up her easel and started sketching.

data.text:
……that evening star…… 
it started…… over there……
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed:
<story>……that evening star…… 
<story>it started…… over there……

data.text: ………That corner……remains empty.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>………That corner……remains empty.

data.text: Then, over there. Standing straight is fine.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>Then, over there. Standing straight is fine.

data.text:
I stood where I was told. It was actually kind 
of hard to stand in the same position, but, if 
this was what she wanted, then it was nothing.
data.processed:
<story>I stood where I was told. It was actually kind 
<story>of hard to stand in the same position, but, if 
<story>this was what she wanted, then it was nothing.

data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>…………?

data.text: Hmmmmm……
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>Hmmmmm……

data.text: ――You
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>――You

data.text: So that's the look you had on your face, is it……?
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>So that's the look you had on your face, is it……?

data.text: Hmmm…………
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>Hmmm…………

data.text: Would you mind not making weird faces?
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>Would you mind not making weird faces?

data.text: ……How strange. Looking at it head on again.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>……How strange. Looking at it head on again.

data.text: How long has it been since……?
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>How long has it been since……?

data.text: Before I realized it, you were "there". You were always――
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>Before I realized it, you were "there". You were always――

data.text:
――And so the sun set, and I heard the sound of her 
putting the pencil down. For some reason, she continued 
to stare at her sketch, even as it got darker……
data.processed:
<story>――And so the sun set, and I heard the sound of her 
<story>putting the pencil down. For some reason, she continued 
<story>to stare at her sketch, even as it got darker……

data.text:
When it was completely dark, we headed back. While we waited 
for a taxi, I asked her how her painting was coming along……
data.processed:
<story>When it was completely dark, we headed back. While we waited 
<story>for a taxi, I asked her how her painting was coming along……

data.text: Who knows?
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu

choices.text: I guess I wasn't a good model

data.processed: <story>Who knows?

data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>…………

data.text: Too self-deprecating.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>Too self-deprecating.

data.text: ……Ah. It's here.
data.name: Mejiro Ramonu
data.processed: <story>……Ah. It's here.

data.text:
She wasn't praising me……probably, but it didn't seem derogatory 
either. As usual, I still couldn't read Mejiro Ramonu.
data.processed:
<story>She wasn't praising me……probably, but it didn't seem derogatory 
<story>either. As usual, I still couldn't read Mejiro Ramonu.
